Title: Screams of Blasphemy
Writer: Shozin Fukui (screenplay), Makoto Hamaguchi (screenplay), Naoshi Gôda (screenplay), Shozin Fukui (story)
Actors: Haji Suzuki, Onn-chan, Kôji Ôtsubo, Kyoko Hara
Plot: Pinocchio 964, lobotomised cyborg sex slave, is thrown out onto the street by his owners because of his inability to maintain an erection. He is befriended by a criminally insane, ...
